channel.title: Object spec restore
channel.description:
hey guys, so i tried to add a object that would restore spec. but for some reason the code i was using wasnt able to compile, would someone be able to help me with adding a object spec restore.
thank you

item.title: Object spec restore
item.dc:creator: @u_loose u loose
item.description:
@u_loose wrote:

i deleted it from my commands yesterday, but ill readd it and post the code

[code]case 3353:
		if (c.isDonator == 1) {
			c.sendMessage("You must be a donator to use this.");
		}
		if (c.specAmount >= 10) {
			c.sendMessage("You special is already full.");
		}
		if(System.currentTimeMillis() - c.lastSpecRestore < 180) {
			c.sendMessage("You can only use this once every 3 minutes.");
			return;
		}
		if (c.isDonator == 1 && c.specAmount <= 10) {
			c.lastSpecRestore = System.currentTimeMillis();	
			c.specAmount == 10;
		}
	break;[/code]

actionhandler.java:70: error: is not a statement.

c.specAmount == 10;
^

Read full topic
